description: Persistent task queue - survives between sessions. Tasks filed here WILL get done.

tasks.request: Build durable task queue system for persistent work tracking
tasks.result_summary: Built complete task queue system: created queue.json, updated SOUL.md (task persistence rules), HEARTBEAT.md (queue worker + briefing integration), AGENTS.md (session startup + references), created TASK-QUEUE.md documentation
tasks.notes: System now operational - tasks persist across sessions and get worked via heartbeat

tasks.request: Write FutureNTech video script #1 for unsigned metal band feature
tasks.result_summary: Wrote complete video script featuring Powerplant (Theo Zhykharyev) - one-man bedroom black metal project from London. Script includes: hook, story breakdown (5 DIY principles), tech angle, performance showcase, CTA. Ready for Michael's review. Band perfect fit: Ukrainian artist, DIY bedroom recording, <$1000 budget, releasing March 13 2026.
tasks.notes: Script awaiting Michael's approval before production begins. Estimated production: 4-6 hours, ~$0.50 cost.
